parameters.name: CancelType
parameters.description:
The method to cancel the update operation. Valid values:

*   Quick: cancels the update of a stack as soon as possible.
*   Safe: cancels the update of a stack as safely as possible.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the stack. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~131035~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
